web.regions.data_sovereignty_description.text: Your data resides exclusively in your chosen region and is never transferred across regions

web.regions.separate_environments_explan.text: Each region operates as a completely independent environment with its own infrastructure, encryption keys, and data storage

web.regions.no_data_transfer_policy.text: We maintain a strict policy: customer data is never transferred between regions under any circumstances

web.regions.switching_creates_new_accoun.text: Important: Switching to a different region creates a new account. Your data stays in your original region.

web.regions.trust_description.text: Know exactly where your data resides and which laws govern its protection.

web.regions.privacy_description.text: Ensure your personal information is handled according to your country's privacy laws and regulations, preventing unauthorized access or misuse.

web.regions.compliance_description.text: Meet GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA, and other regional data protection requirements

web.regions.performance_description.text: Data stored closer to you means lower latency and better performance.

web.regions.your_account_and_data_are_pr.text: Your account and data are protected under the laws of

web.regions.this_regulatory_framework_is.text: Your regulatory framework is determined by your access domain:

web.regions.each_jurisdiction_maintains_.text: Each region is completely separate with its own infrastructure, when possible with its own local hosting provider. You can create accounts in multiple regions, but no data is shared between them.

web.regions.to_understand_the_specific_r.text: For details on regulations and protections that apply to your account,
